alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 9:58PM CDT until June 18 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Tippah County in northeastern Mississippi... Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Hardeman County in west Tennessee... Southwestern McNairy County in west Tennessee... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 957 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Pocahontas, or 13 miles southwest of Big Hill Pond State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corinth, Hinkle, Theo, Walnut, Eastview, Falkner, Guys, Kossuth, Chalybeate, Allentown, Hightown, Caffey, Collinstown, Wenasoga, Biggersville, Crumtown, Jobes, Essary Springs, Brownfield and Gift. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Mississippi...and west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
